Headline: 12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt,Ashland ,15th,Loomis,and Roosevelt due to,street blockage near Roosevelt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #12 Roosevelt  buses are temporarily rerouted via  Roosevelt,Ashland ,15th,Loomis and Roosevelt , due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at 69th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Granville
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
